import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {CalciteShell ,CalciteShellPanel, CalciteActionBar, CalcitePickList, CalciteShellCenterRow, CalcitePopoverManager, CalciteAction } from '@esri/calcite-components-react'; import '@esri/calcite-components/dist/calcite/calcite.css'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [sliderValue, setSliderValue] = useState(70); return ( /*

Hello, React

Test setSliderValue(e.target.value)} />

The slider currently has a value of {sliderValue}

*/

ESRI Assignment 1 - Ameet Rahane

This application was built by Esri's @arahane using Calcite Components
); } export default App;
